name: Great Value LED Light bulbs
productDescription: Light up any home, school, restaurant, office or store with the Viribright 60 Watt Replacement A19 LED Light Bulbs.
With low energy consumption, these bulbs are energy efficient and a great overall choice for both your home and the planet.
These cool white LED light bulbs look great in bathroom applications, kitchen spaces, table and floor lamps, ceiling fixtures, hallways and large rooms needing ample light.
With stunning CRI and high-lumen output per watt, these bulbs give your room the upper hand with great looks and even better energy savings.
Replace your old traditional incandescent light bulbs with these energy-efficient Viribright light bulbs.

reviewers.name: Raniel
reviewers.review: These bulbs are really nice. I'm glad i tried them.

reviewers.name: Kevin
reviewers.review: These bulbs are also dimmable. I really like this
